com.here.android.mpa.routing

Class UMRouteOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.android.mpa.routing.RouteOptions
      • com.here.android.mpa.routing.UMRouteOptions

  • public class UMRouteOptions
extends RouteOptions
    The class contains Urban Mobility specific options for route calculation.

    IMPORTANT: Urban Mobility routing is a Beta feature. The related classes are subject to change without notice.

    • Method Detail

      • setTransitWalkMaxDistance

        public UMRouteOptions setTransitWalkMaxDistance(int value)
        Sets maximum allowed walk distance in meters. Allowed range is [0, 6000], or -1 to use default value. Using unsupported value will result error response in route calculation. The default is 2000.
        Parameters:
        value - maximum allowed walk distance in meters
        Returns:
        The modified UMRouteOptions itself.

      • getTransitWalkMaxDistance

        public int getTransitWalkMaxDistance()
        Gets maximum allowed walk distance in meters or -1 if not set.
        Returns:
        maximum allowed walk distance in meters, or -1 if not set

      • isStrictRouteCountEnabled

        public boolean isStrictRouteCountEnabled()
        Checks whether specified route count is strict. The default is false.
        Returns:
        true if strict otherwise false

      • setStrictRouteCountEnabled

        public UMRouteOptions setStrictRouteCountEnabled(boolean value)
        Sets whether specified route count is strict. If route count is strict then result contains specified number of routes or less; otherwise, the number of routes returned is not guaranteed. The default is false. NOTE: Do not enable strict route count if you plan to use subsequent route requests.
        Parameters:
        value - true if strict otherwise false.
        Returns:
        The modified UMRouteOptions itself.

      • getAllowedTransports

        public java.util.EnumSet<TransportType> getAllowedTransports()
        Gets set of allowed transport types.
        Returns:
        EnumSet<TransportType> of allowed transports, or null if not set.
        Audience:
        internal

      • setAllowedTransports

        public UMRouteOptions setAllowedTransports(java.util.EnumSet<TransportType> transports)
        Sets allowed transport types. It allows to filter out specific transport types from the route response.
        Parameters:
        transports - EnumSet<TransportType> of allowed transports, or null to unset filter.
        Returns:
        The modified UMRouteOptions itself.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if transports is empty.
        Audience:
        internal

      • getTransitOptions

        public TransitOptions getTransitOptions()
        Gets public transit options that should be applied to route result.
        Returns:
        TransitOptions to be applied for public transit, or null if not set.
        Audience:
        internal

      • setTransitOptions

        public UMRouteOptions setTransitOptions(TransitOptions options)
        Sets public transit options that should be applied to route result. It allows to put some constraints on it (e.g. maximum changes). The default is null. TransportTypes that belongs to public transit are: TRAIN_HIGH_SPEED, TRAIN_INTERCITY, TRAIN_INTERREGIONAL_AND_FAST, TRAIN_REGIONAL_AND_OTHER, TRAIN_CITY, BUS, WATER_BOAT_OR_FERRYS, RAIL_UNDEGROUND_OR_SUBWAY, RAIL_TRAM, ORDERED_SERVICES_OR_TAXI, RAIL_INCLINED, AERIAL, BUS_RAPID, RAIL_MONORAIL.
        Parameters:
        options - TransitOptions to be applied for public transit, or null to unset.
        Returns:
        The modified UMRouteOptions itself.
        Audience:
        internal

      • getFilteringProfile

        public UMRouteOptions.FilteringProfile getFilteringProfile()
        Gets filtering profile.
        Returns:
        The UMRouteOptions.FilteringProfile.
        Audience:

      • setFilteringProfile

        public UMRouteOptions setFilteringProfile(UMRouteOptions.FilteringProfile value)
        Sets filtering profile to be used. It allows to change default transport and operator filtering behavior.
        Parameters:
        value - UMRouteOptions.FilteringProfile to be applied. Must not be null.
        Returns:
        The modified UMRouteOptions itself.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if value is null.
        Audience:
        internal
